plot: Nigel Bruce is tied to the railroad track by the mafia. He is given a chance to make one phone call to Rick, who can save his life. A little girl picks up the phone and Nigel has to get past her to Rick before the train comes.
title: Area-Code
plot_es: Nigel Bruce is tied to the railroad track by the mafia. He is given a chance to make one phone call to Rick, who can save his life. A little girl picks up the phone and Nigel has to get past her to Rick before the train comes.
